welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Eloy, a charming city known for its rich history and small-town charm. We invite you to explore and discover all that this beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the wifi network for free with a valid boarding pass.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Marana Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Marana Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport terminal.
